mapper.select: /* lmmdev11.mapper.AdminMapper.selectAdmin */ SELECT ADMIN_NO , BRANCH_ID , ADMIN_ID , PASSWD , ADMIN_NM , HP_NUM , ADMIN_ROLE_ID , LAST_LOGIN_DT , PWD_INIT_YN , PWD_MOD_DT , LOGIN_FAIL_CNT , LOGIN_FAIL_DT , IS_VALID , REG_DT , REG_ID , MOD_DT , MOD_ID FROM DL_ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_ID = #{adminId}
